page.title: 02LOWER DARNFORD FARMHOUSE
page.content: {Lower Darnford Farmhouse}is owned by a man who lives in London.It is rented to schools and families.Our school rented it for four weeks,starting from May 11th.The other buildings and fields are owned by{Mr.Sankey}from {Brow Farm. Most of our ten and eleven year olds stay for three nights in groups of about twelve,with two or three teachers. We find out about the area.We work at the farm and carry on at school.We cook our own meals and do all the chores ourselves. The farm has on the ground floor a kitchen,toilet,lounge and workroom. Upstairs there are four bedrooms, a bathroom,two toilets and a shower. The house was built out of brick in about 1875.It has changed quite a lot.
